# Import packages
```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
distance <- read_csv("distances_birthtown-1.csv")
View(distance)
skimr::skim(distance)
```

```{r}
# Replace missing values (-9999999) with NA
cleaned_data <- distance %>%
  mutate(across(c(income, income_parent1, income_parent2), ~replace(., . == -9999999, NA)))

# Create the new variable: sum of parental incomes
cleaned_data <- distance %>%
  mutate(income_parents = income_parent1 + income_parent2)
View(cleaned_data)
```
